attributes.action: lower diesel and petrol and other fuel prices
attributes.additional_details:
This is extremely important as the prices of fuel both diesel and petrol and oil are reaching prices that people cannot afford to pay.
 This is affecting everyone in some shape or form. It is getting to the point that people will not be able to afford to put fuel in there cars to go to work and the government need to step in and change this. People are struggling enough after the covid pandemic so  this is not what we need. The prices are sky high and people who need cars for work are suffering.
attributes.background: We need the government to step in and get fuel prices lowered as prices are sky high and they have the power too step in.

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of fuel, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Set up an independent regulator to monitor and regulate vehicle fuel pricing: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605282
